here's what i did to get it to work
1) Extract both .rar's
2) Mount the file "SC4DELUXE1.mdf in cd 1 folder, a window should appear where you can choose to install.
3) When it gets to around 50% complete it will ask to insert disc 2, instead mount "SIMCITY 4 DELUXE EDITION CD2.img" in cd 2 folder and click ok and it should continue installing
4) When it has finished installing, mount "SIMCITY 4 DELUXE EDITION CD2.CCD" in the cd 2 folder.
5) Go into my computer then into local disc (C:), then into program files. find the maxis folder and go into it until you see a folder called "Apps" go into that and double click the SimCity 4.exe

It should start up after that :P

Hey guys, I just finished my seeding time 80.0, anyways, to install Sim City 4.

Follow these instructions.
1. Go get Daemon Tools (And yes you have to  restart before installing, so it can install it's stuff to the kernel.)

2. Right click on the daemon tools icon on the task bar, then under emulation enable all.

3. Mount CD 1

4. Install as you would any game using the serial.txt as the serial.

5. Mount CD 2 when prompted. Finish.

6. Enjoy, remember to keep CD 2 mounted when you launch.

Install was flawless but actual gameplay for me is terrible when scrolling or zooming in/out. 

This shouldn't be with a Radeon X850 PE, any advice?

(Yes i have updated to latest drivers, defragged etc etc... Any other game i have installed works fine)

yea this was a great release, everything works perfectly

jus use daemon tools, right click on the lil icon down to the right, go to emulation, all options on.

then u mount the first image, then (when requested) u mount the 2nd image (which is the one in .que format)

Enjoy The Game!!!

Install Power ISO or Magic ISo with Virtual drive software.
Unpack downloads of CD1 and CD2
Set virtual drives to 1
Mount ISO from CD1 in virtual drive and run setup.
Enter Serial code when prompted.
When prompted for CD2 unmount CD1 and mount image file from CD2
You may then need to remount CD1 if asked depending on what you do.
It only seems to be able to handle one drive.
Alternatively you can mount the images to CDs but need a proper copy of Magic ISO to overcome the 300MB limit

7.  You will be taken to tutorial area.

Also there are no virus that were detected.

Easiest torrent game to install ever.  I don't post much but I figured so many people are having so many problems, I'll help you all ou.  Follow exactly and you can't go wrong.

1) download and extract with winrar.  You will have two folers (cd 1, cd2) and a text file containing the serial.

2) Using Daemon tools (make sure you have the latest version 4.30.1) If you don't have it, google it - it's free.

3) Set Daemon Tools to TWO devices.  From cd folder one, mount the .mds file on device 1.  DO NOT START INSTALLATION YET.  On device 2, mount the .img file from folder CD folder 2. When mounting, change daemon tools to *.* all files, so it recognizes the .img file.

4)Now click install.  Enter the serial found in the .txt file in your download folder.

The installation will run and not even ask for cd 2 if you've done this right.  The game will start immidiately after installation.  You DO NOT need the patch or no CD crack if you don't want it.  If you have enough room to leave the cd mounted, I recomend leaving the .exe file alone. If you want the patch and nocd files, find them here:

patch - http://simcity.ea.com/update/index_update.php?product=EP1&x=45&y=12

nocd - http://gcw.fluxgames.com/games/pc_simcity_4_deluxe_edition.shtml

A few important things about this upload:
1. Despite the posted info, this is really the North American version, referred to as SKU1 on the official EA update page, and only has American English, and is the Right Hand Drive version (as opposed to the Left hand Drive British English version).
2. What is GOOD about this upload is that Daemon Tools Lite will mount the second disk image correctly, allowing you to play the game without a crack.  Other uploaded versions may or may not get stuck at a picture of a bridge when you attempt to start it without a crack; this one does not.
3. What is BAD about this upload is that the official updates do not work; they fail to update the SimCity_3.dat file.  I downloaded a different upload of SC4 and installed from that, and the official updates worked properly.
4. You want the official updates to work properly so you can run NAM 2009.

1) download and extract with winrar. You will have two folers (cd 1, cd2) and a text file containing the serial.

2) Using Daemon tools (make sure you have the latest version 4.30.1) If you don't have it, google it - it's free.

3) Set Daemon Tools to TWO devices. From cd folder one, mount the .mds file on device 1. DO NOT START INSTALLATION YET. On device 2, mount the .img file from folder CD folder 2. When mounting, change daemon tools to *.* all files, so it recognizes the .img file.

4)Now click install. Enter the serial found in the .txt file in your download folder.

The installation will run and not even ask for cd 2 if you've done this right. The game will start immidiately after installation. You DO NOT need the patch or no CD crack if you don't want it. If you have enough room to leave the cd mounted, I recomend leaving the .exe file alone. If you want the patch and nocd files, find them here:

patch - http://simcity.ea.com/update/index_update.php?product=EP1&x=45&y=12

nocd - http://gcw.fluxgames.com/games/pc_simcity_4_deluxe_edition.shtml
